title: Clean the River
description: Sponsor a worker to help clean our local river and restore its natural beauty. Your donation funds equipment and fair wages for youth volunteers.
detailedDescription: Your donation will provide gloves, nets, and safety gear for youth volunteers. The funds also cover logistics and awareness campaigns to keep the river clean long-term.

title: Sponsor School Kits
description: Help underprivileged children get access to essential school supplies. Each donation provides a kit with books, stationery, and a backpack.
detailedDescription: Each kit includes notebooks, pens, pencils, erasers, and a sturdy backpack. Your support ensures children can attend school with dignity and the tools they need to succeed.

title: Community Health Camp
description: Fund a youth-led health camp providing free checkups and medicines to the needy. Your support covers medical supplies and logistics.
detailedDescription: Funds will be used for medical supplies, doctor honorariums, and transportation. The camp will offer free checkups, medicines, and health education to hundreds in need.

title: Plant Trees for Tomorrow
description: Join youth groups in planting native trees across deforested areas. Donations support saplings, tools, and event coordination.
detailedDescription: Your support funds saplings, biodegradable guards, and helps organize tree-planting drives involving students and eco-clubs.

title: Rebuild Flood-Affected Homes
description: Support families whose homes were destroyed in floods. Your contribution helps youth groups supply basic construction materials.
detailedDescription: Donations will provide cement, tarpaulin sheets, wood, and essential tools to assist rebuilding efforts led by youth volunteers.

title: Solar Lights for Villages
description: Help light up rural homes with clean solar energy. Your donation funds solar kits installed by trained youth technicians.
detailedDescription: Each solar kit includes a panel, battery, and LED lights. Youth volunteers are trained to install and educate villagers on usage and maintenance.

title: Rural Digital Literacy
description: Empower young people in rural areas by funding internet access and basic computer skills workshops.
detailedDescription: Funds provide mobile hotspots, laptops, and training material for youth-led digital literacy camps to bridge the digital divide.

title: Festive Kits for Orphanages
description: Bring smiles to children in orphanages during festivals. Kits include clothes, sweets, and toys.
detailedDescription: Youth groups distribute customized festive kits that include traditional wear, healthy sweets, and games for children in shelter homes.

title: Water Purifiers for Schools
description: Provide clean drinking water to children in rural schools. Your donation supports purifier installations by youth teams.
detailedDescription: Funds cover the cost of water filters, installation, and health awareness drives conducted by trained student volunteers.

title: Bicycles for Young Girls
description: Support education for girls by funding bicycles to help them travel safely to school in remote areas.
detailedDescription: Donations help purchase sturdy bicycles, safety gear, and train youth ambassadors to monitor attendance and encourage education among girls.
